name: Hollowed
description: Hollowed tells the story of a woman who will do anything to bring her perished loved one back to the world of the living. Control Halia and her spirit Oco simultaneously on a single controller in this side-scrolling puzzle platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 7XXX or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Minimum requirements may change before publishing.
